sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { data } from './FruitsData' import "./fruits.css" import { SearchContext } from '../Context'; export default function DisplayFruits() { const[search,setSearch]=useContext(SearchContext); console.log(search) return ( <>

Best Selling Fruits in Coimbatore!

{data.map((items)=> <>

Name:{items.name}

Family:{items.family}

) }
) }
